actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage, or 9 (3d4 + 2) Slashing damage if the aarakocra moved 30+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

actions.name: Wind Javelin
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Thunder damage. Hit or Miss: The javelin magically returns to the aarakocra's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mucus Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater. While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes 6 (1d12) Acid damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 15 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of four tentacles.

actions.name: Consume Memories
actions.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 30 feet that is Charmed or Grappled by the aboleth. Failure: 10 (3d6) Psychic damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: The aboleth gains the target's memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this action.

actions.name: Dominate Mind (2/Day)
actions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target. While Charmed, the target acts as an ally to the aboleth and is under its control while within 60 feet of it. The target repeats the save whenever it takes damage as well as after every 24 hours it spends at least 1 mile away from the aboleth, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendaryActions.name: Lash
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes one Tentacle attack.

legendaryActions.name: Psychic Drain
legendaryActions.description: If the aboleth has at least one creature Charmed or Grappled, it uses Consume Memories and regains 5 (1d10) Hit Points.

traits.name: Air Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two Thunderous Slam attacks.

actions.name: Thunderous Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 13, one Medium or smaller creature in the elemental's space. Failure: 24 (4d10 + 2) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the elemental and has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.description: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5 (with Advantage if the target is Grappled by the ankheg), reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13).

actions.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 14 (4d6) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The arcanaloth has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Tome
traits.description: The arcanaloth has a magic tome (AC 17; HP 35; Immune to Necrotic, Poison, Psychic). While holding it, the arcanaloth can use Banishing Claw. If destroyed, it creates a new one after a Short or Long Rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The arcanaloth makes three Fiendish Burst attacks. It can replace one attack with a Banishing Claw attack.

actions.name: Fiendish Burst
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Banishing Claw (Requires Soul Tome)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) Slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) Psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma Saving Throw or be trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome (Incapacitated). Repeats save at end of turns.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The arcanaloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

reactions.name: Counterspell
reactions.description: The arcanaloth casts Counterspell in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The hag has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the hag fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Coven Magic
traits.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast: Augury, Find Familiar, Identify, Locate Object, Scrying, or Unseen Servant (Int save DC 19). Long Rest recharge.

traits.name: Spiteful Escape
traits.description: When drops to 0 HP, teleports to a harmless demiplane unless within 30 ft of its anathema. Curses creatures within 60 ft of departure point (Disadvantage on checks/saves).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hag makes two Spectral Claw attacks and uses Crackling Wave.

actions.name: Spectral Claw
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +14, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) Force damage. If target is Large or smaller, it has Prone condition.

actions.name: Crackling Wave
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. Failure: 32 (5d12) Lightning damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: Target is cursed (can't take Reactions) until end of hag's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: Charisma based (save DC 22):

bonusActions.name: Witch Strike
bonusActions.description: Each creature cursed by the hag and within 60 feet of it takes 14 (4d6) Lightning damage.

reactions.name: Tongue Twister
reactions.description: Casts Counterspell. If target fails save, it is cursed (no Verbal spells, speaks opposite meaning) until end of its next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Hag's Swipe
legendaryActions.description: The hag makes one Spectral Claw attack.

legendaryActions.name: Malicious Magic
legendaryActions.description: The hag casts Dimension Door or Hypnotic Pattern.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: Takes no damage on successful Dex save against area effects, half on failure.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The assassin makes three attacks, using Shortsword or Light Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) Poison damage, and target is Poisoned until start of assassin's next turn.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 80/320 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) Poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Cunning Action
bonusActions.description: The assassin takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Rake
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The axe beak makes one Sharpened Beak attack and one Talons attack.

actions.name: Sharpened Beak
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) Slashing damage, and a creature within 5 feet of the target (axe beak's choice) takes 6 (1d12) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage. If target is Large or smaller, it has Prone condition.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: End of turn: creatures in 5 ft Emanation take 11 (2d10) Fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: Sheds Bright Light 10 ft, Dim Light 10 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The azer makes two Flame Burst attacks.

actions.name: Flame Burst
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: Wisdom based (save DC 15):

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke (2/Day)
reactions.description: Casts Hellish Rebuke in response to trigger.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: End of turn: creatures in 5 ft Emanation take 5 (1d10) Fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: Sheds Bright Light 10 ft, Dim Light 10 ft.

actions.name: Burning Hammer
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aarakocra makes two Wind Staff attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast Gust of Wind.

actions.name: Wind Staff
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: Wisdom based (save DC 13):

reactions.name: Feather Fall (1/Day)
reactions.description: Casts Feather Fall in response to trigger.

traits.name: Animal Lordship
traits.description: Represents a Forager, Hunter, or Sage (DM's choice), which determines certain traits.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the animal lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Lordly Presence
traits.description: Wisdom Save DC 20 for enemies starting turn in 30ft. Failure effects based on type: Captivated (Forager/Charmed+Incapacitated), Fearful (Hunter/Frightened), or Mired (Sage/Psychic Dmg+Bewildered).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two attacks (Rend or Radiant Ray) and uses Animal Spirit.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +12, range 120 ft. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Animal Spirit
actions.description: Dexterity Save DC 20, one creature within 120 ft. Failure: 28 (4d10 + 6) Radiant damage. Success: Half damage. Additional effect based on type: Fortify (Forager/Temp HP), Marked as Prey (Hunter/Advantage), or Pesky Swarm (Sage/Disadvantage).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: Wisdom based (save DC 20):

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: Shape-shifts into a Huge or smaller version of the animal it represents or a Medium or Small Humanoid, or returns to true form.

legendaryActions.name: Feral Strike
legendaryActions.description: Moves up to Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and makes one Rend attack.

legendaryActions.name: Radiant Strike
legendaryActions.description: Makes one Radiant Ray attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The armor makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The broom doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slash
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Smother
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. Medium or smaller creature: Grappled (escape DC 13) instead of damage. While grappled: Blinded, Restrained, Suffocating, and takes 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning at start of its turns. Rug halves damage it takes and transfers to target.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.description: The balor explodes when it dies. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the balor. Failure: 31 (9d6) Fire damage plus 31 (9d6) Force damage. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the balor's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the balor takes 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the balor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The balor has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The balor makes one Flame Whip attack and one Lightning Blade attack.

actions.name: Flame Whip
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach 30 ft. Hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) Force damage plus 17 (5d6) Fire damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the balor pulls the target up to 25 feet straight toward itself, and the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Lightning Blade
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach 10 ft. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) Force damage plus 22 (4d10) Lightning damage, and the target can't take Reactions until the start of the balor's next turn.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The balor teleports itself or a willing demon within 10 feet of itself up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the balor can see.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 30/90 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +3, range 80/320 ft. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bandit makes two attacks, using Scimitar and Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 30/90 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: Trigger: The bandit is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The bandit adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bandit makes three Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Blinding Flash (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the bandit can see within 120 feet. Failure: 13 (3d6 + 3) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the start of the bandit's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The bandit casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): At Will: Disguise Self, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion; 1/Day Each: Hold Person (level 4 version), Mage Armor (included in AC), Major Image

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: If the bandit is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the bandit instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bandit makes three attacks, using Scimitar or Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 30/90. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Deadly Aim
bonusActions.description: The bandit gives itself Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn. If that attack hits, the target takes an extra 28 (8d6) Poison damage.

traits.name: Detect Life
traits.description: The banshee magically senses the direction of creatures up to 1 mile away that aren't Constructs or Undead.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The banshee makes two Corrupting Touch attacks and uses Horrify.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horrify
actions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the banshee can see within 60 feet that can see the banshee. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of the banshee's next turn.

actions.name: Deathly Wail (1/Day)
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature within 30 feet that can hear the wail and isn't a Construct or an Undead. Failure: If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

traits.name: Barbed Hide
traits.description: At the start of each of its turns, the devil deals 5 (1d10) Piercing damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes one Claws attack and one Tail attack, or it makes two Hurl Flame attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from both claws.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 150 ft. Hit: 17 (5d6) Fire damage.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the barlgura dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The barlgura makes one Tormenting Bite attack and two Thrash attacks.

actions.name: Tormenting Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Thrash
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The barlgura casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13): 2/Day Each: Disguise Self, Invisibility (self only); 1/Day Each: Entangle, Phantasmal Killer (level 6 version).

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The barlgura jumps up to 40 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Petrifying Gaze (Recharge 4-6)
bonusActions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. If the basilisk sees its reflection in the Cone, the basilisk must make this save. First Failure: The target has the Restrained condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the Petrified condition instead of the Restrained condition.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes one Beard attack and one Infernal Glaive attack.

actions.name: Beard
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the devil's next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain Hit Points.

actions.name: Infernal Glaive
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 10 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature and doesn't already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses 5 (1d10) Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The behir makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) Piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 18, one Large or smaller creature the behir can see within 5 feet. Failure: 28 (5d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 16), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 66 (12d10) Lightning damage. Success: Half damage.

bonusActions.name: Swallow
bonusActions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the behir (the behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time). Failure: The behir swallows the target, which is no longer Grappled. While swallowed, a creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and takes 21 (6d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within 10 feet of the behir and has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the beholder fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The beholder uses Eye Rays three times.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The beholder randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d10; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn). (See text for full list: Charm, Paralyzing, Fear, Slowing, Enervation, Telekinetic, Sleep, Petrification, Disintegration, Death).

bonusActions.name: Antimagic Cone
bonusActions.description: The beholder's central eye emits an antimagic wave in a 150-foot Cone. Until the start of the beholder's next turn, that area acts as an Antimagic Field spell, and that area works against the beholder's own Eye Rays.

legendaryActions.name: Chomp
legendaryActions.description: The beholder makes two Bite attacks.

legendaryActions.name: Glare
legendaryActions.description: The beholder uses Eye Rays.

traits.name: Bloodied Frenzy
traits.description: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The berserker makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Javelin in any combination.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage, plus 10 (3d6) Thunder damage to the target or another creature within 5 feet of the target.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the berserker's next turn.

bonusActions.name: Frenzied Rush
bonusActions.description: Each ally within 30 feet of the berserker can take a Reaction to move up to half the ally's Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. The berserker can also move up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

traits.name: Bloodied Frenzy
traits.description: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 22 (5d8) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 49 (14d6) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Melf's Acid Arrow (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 10 ft. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Corrosive Form
traits.description: A creature that hits the pudding with a melee attack roll takes 4 (1d8) Acid damage. Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the pudding and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative -1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the pudding and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the Mending spell on the weapon.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Dissolving Pseudopod
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 10 ft. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) Acid damage. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the Mending spell on the armor.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.description: Trigger: While the pudding is Large or Medium and has 10+ Hit Points, it becomes Bloodied or is subjected to Lightning or Slashing damage. Response: The pudding splits into two new Black Puddings. Each new pudding is one size smaller than the original pudding and acts on its Initiative. The original pudding's Hit Points are divided evenly between the new puddings (round down).

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The blight has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the blight's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Constricting Vine

Until the grapple ends, the target takes 4 (1d8) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the blight can't make Constricting Vine attacks.

actions.name: Entangling Plants (Recharge 5-6)

actions.name: Grasping Root
actions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, one Large or smaller creature the blight can see within 15 feet. Failure: The target is pulled up to 10 feet straight toward the blight and has the Grappled condition (escape DC 16) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 13 (2d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns.

bonusActions.name: Gnash
bonusActions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature Grappled by the blight. Failure: 19 (3d8 + 6) Piercing damage. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Blight Seeds
traits.description: When it finishes a Long Rest, the blight expels 1d6 seeds into unoccupied spaces on the ground within 30 feet of itself[cite: 805]. After 24 hours, the seeds become creatures under the blight's control. Roll 1d8 for each seed to determine the creature it becomes: on 1-4, Twig Blight; on 5-6, Needle Blight; on 7-8, Vine Blight[cite: 807, 808].

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The blight makes two attacks, using Slam or Thorn Volley in any combination. It also uses Life-Draining Root[cite: 810].

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +12, reach 10 ft. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage[cite: 811].

actions.name: Thorn Volley
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +12, range 60/180 ft. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) Piercing damage[cite: 812].

actions.name: Life-Draining Root
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20, one Huge or smaller creature the blight can see within 30 feet. Failure: 14 (2d6 + 7) Necrotic damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 17) from one of six roots[cite: 814]. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition and takes 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns[cite: 815]. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the blight regains Hit Points equal to that amount[cite: 816].

languages: Understands Elvish and Sylvan but can't speak them

traits.name: Astral Implosion
traits.description: If the blob is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea[cite: 878]. The blob itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it[cite: 879]. In 1d20 years, the blob reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane[cite: 880].

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: The blob moves up to its Speed and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects[cite: 887]. Strength Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature or object whose space the blob enters for the first time during this move[cite: 888]. Failure: The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the blob, and when the blob moves, the engulfed target moves with it[cite: 889]. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed[cite: 890]. While engulfed, a creature takes 21 (6d6) Force damage at the start of each of its turns, is suffocating, has the Restrained condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns[cite: 891]. An engulfed creature that is reduced to 0 Hit Points dissolves into ash, which is ejected into the Astral Sea. Success: The target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space[cite: 893].

actions.name: Restraining Glob

Failure: 18 (3d6 + 8) Acid damage[cite: 895]. The glob rolls the target 60 feet straight toward the blob, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of its next turn, when the glob harmlessly dissolves[cite: 896]. Success: Half damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the bulette.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The bulette jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.description: The bulette jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.description: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bullywug makes two Bog Staff attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Ray of Sickness.

actions.name: Bog Staff
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The bullywug casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks): At Will: Dancing Lights, Druidcraft, Ray of Sickness; 1/Day Each: Speak with Plants, Vitriolic Sphere.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The bullywug jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The bullywug jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cambion makes two attacks, using Claw or Fire Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Ray

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The carrion crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The carrion crawler uses Paralyzing Tentacles and makes one Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the carrion crawler can see within 10 feet. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The centaur makes two attacks, using Forest Staff or Sun Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Forest Staff
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Sun Ray
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 90 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the start of the centaur's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The centaur casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Druidcraft, Speak with Animals.

bonusActions.name: Entangling Trail (Recharge 5-6)
bonusActions.description: The centaur moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. Each creature within 5 feet of the centaur as it moves is targeted once by the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The centaur makes two attacks, using Pike or Longbow in any combination.

actions.name: Pike
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 150/600 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Trampling Charge (Recharge 5-6)
bonusActions.description: The centaur moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and can move through the spaces of Medium or smaller creatures. Each creature whose space the centaur enters is targeted once by the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two Chain attacks and uses Conjure Infernal Chain.

actions.name: Chain
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two chains, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Conjure Infernal Chain
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the devil can see within 60 feet. Failure: 9 (2d4 + 4) Fire damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of the devil's next turn, at which point the chain disappears. If the target is Large or smaller, the devil moves the target up to 30 feet straight toward itself. Success: The chain disappears.

reactions.name: Unnerving Gaze
reactions.description: Trigger: A creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil and can see the devil. Response: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, the triggering creature. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the end of its turn. Success: The target is immune to this devil's Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the chasme dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The chasme has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The chasme can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

bonusActions.name: Drone
bonusActions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the chasme (demons automatically succeed on this save). Failure: The target has the Unconscious condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. The target succeeds automatically after 10 minutes or if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to empty a flask of Holy Water on it. Success: The target is immune to this chasme's Drone for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chimera makes one Ram attack, one Bite attack, and one Claw attack. It can replace the Claw attack with a use of Fire Breath if available.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage, or 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage if the chimera had Advantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Ram
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 31 (7d8) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

languages: Understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The chuul can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.description: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the Detect Magic spell but isn't itself magical.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Pincer
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two pincers.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature Grappled by the chuul. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

traits.name: Acid Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to Acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn Bloodied, roll 1d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to be berserk until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem can't shape-shift.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 6 (1d12) Acid damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Acid damage taken.

bonusActions.name: Hasten (Recharge 5-6)

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in Bright Light, the cloaker has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cloaker makes one Attach attack and two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Attach
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the cloaker attaches to it. While the cloaker is attached, the target has the Blinded condition, and the cloaker can't make Bite attacks against other targets. In addition, the cloaker halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to try to detach the cloaker, doing so by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

Second Failure: The target has the Petrified condition, instead of the Restrained condition, for 24 hours.

First Failure: The target has the Restrained condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the Petrified condition instead of the Restrained condition.

actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

languages: Understands Celestial and Common but can't speak

actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +15, reach 15 ft. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Acid damage.

actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in an 90-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. Failure: 63 (14d8) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Slam

traits.name: Swarm

actions.name: Radiant Ray

actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

actions.name: Elemental Claw
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 120 ft. Hit: 22 (4d10) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the cultist moves the target up to 10 feet straight toward or away from itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Elementalism, Mage Hand

reactions.name: Elemental Absorption (1/Day)
reactions.description: Trigger: The cultist takes Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage. Response: The cultist gives itself Resistance to that instance of damage and gains 10 Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cultist makes three Pact Axe attacks.

actions.name: Pact Axe
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks): At Will: Scorching Ray (level 5 version), Thaumaturgy; 2/Day: Fireball (level 6 version)

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke
reactions.description: The cultist casts Hellish Rebuke in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cyclops makes two attacks, using Radiant Strike or Flash of Light in any combination.

actions.name: Radiant Strike
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Flash of Light
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +10, range 120 ft. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Radiant damage, and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the cyclops's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The cyclops casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): 2/Day Each: Arcane Eye, Detect Magic, Locate Object; 1/Day: Legend Lore

reactions.name: Portent (Recharge 4-6)
reactions.description: Trigger: The cyclops or an ally it can see makes a D20 Test. Response: The cyclops rolls 1d20 and chooses whether to use that roll in place of the d20 rolled for the D20 Test.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cyclops makes two attacks, using Greatclub or Rock in any combination.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 30/120 ft. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Limited Foresight (Recharge 6)
reactions.description: Trigger: A creature the cyclops can see makes an attack roll against it. Response: The cyclops imposes Disadvantage on the roll, and the cyclops gains Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the cyclops's next turn.

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The dao can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Elemental Restoration
traits.description: If the dao dies outside the Elemental Plane of Earth, its body dissolves into dirt, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Earth.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The dao has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Wishes
traits.description: The dao has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the dao knows it, the dao can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the dao can understand. If the dao casts the spell for the creature, the dao suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the dao has cast it three times, the dao can't do so again for 365 days.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dao makes three Earthen Maul attacks or two Earth Burst attacks.

actions.name: Earthen Maul
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Earth Burst
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +10, range 120 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: Earth explodes from the target's space, creating the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from and including the target. Failure: 10 (3d6) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The dao casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Detect Magic, Stone Shape; 1/Day Each: Gaseous Form, Invisibility, Move Earth, Passwall, Plane Shift, Tongues, Wall of Stone

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the darkmantle had Advantage on the attack roll, it covers the target, which has the Blinded condition and is suffocating while the darkmantle is attached in this way. While attached to a target, the darkmantle can attack only the target but has Advantage on its attack rolls. Its Speed becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its Speed, and it moves with the target. A creature can take an action to try to detach the darkmantle from itself, doing so with a successful DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check. On its turn, the darkmantle can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement.

actions.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
actions.description: Magical Darkness fills a 15-foot Emanation originating from the darkmantle. This effect lasts while the darkmantle maintains Concentration on it, up to 10 minutes. Darkvision can't penetrate this area, and no light can illuminate it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death dog makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. First Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition. While Poisoned, the target's Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and it repeats the save every 24 hours that elapse, ending the effect on itself on a success. Subsequent Failures: The Poisoned target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10).

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the death knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The death knight has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Marshal Undead
traits.description: Undead creatures of the death knight's choice (excluding itself) in a 60-foot Emanation originating from it have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the death knight is destroyed before it atones for its evil, it gains a new body in 1d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in a location significant to the death knight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death knight makes three Dread Blade attacks.

actions.name: Dread Blade
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Orb (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the death knight can see within 120 feet. Failure: 35 (10d6) Fire damage plus 35 (10d6) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The death knight casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18): At Will: Command, Phantom Steed; 2/Day: Destructive Wave (Necrotic), Dispel Magic.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: Trigger: The death knight is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

legendaryActions.name: Dread Authority
legendaryActions.description: The death knight uses Spellcasting to cast Command. The death knight can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Fell Word
legendaryActions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature the death knight can see within 120 feet. Failure: 17 (5d6) Necrotic damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken. Failure or Success: The death knight can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Lunge
legendaryActions.description: The death knight moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Dread Blade attack.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The aspirant has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Marshal Undead
traits.description: Undead creatures of the aspirant's choice (excluding itself) in a 60-foot Emanation originating from it have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aspirant makes three Dread Blade attacks.

actions.name: Dread Blade
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Orb (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the aspirant can see within 120 feet of itself. Failure: 21 (6d6) Fire damage plus 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The aspirant casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Phantom Steed; 1/Day: Destructive Wave (Necrotic), Dispel Magic.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: Trigger: The aspirant is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The aspirant adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the death tyrant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death tyrant uses Eye Rays three times.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The death tyrant randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d10; reroll if the death tyrant has already used that ray during this turn). 1: Charm Ray (Wis Save DC 17), 2: Paralyzing Ray (Con Save DC 17), 3: Fear Ray (Wis Save DC 17), 4: Slowing Ray (Con Save DC 17), 5: Enervation Ray (Con Save DC 17), 6: Telekinetic Ray (Str Save DC 17), 7: Sleep Ray (Wis Save DC 17), 8: Petrification Ray (Con Save DC 17), 9: Disintegration Ray (Dex Save DC 17), 10: Death Ray (Dex Save DC 17).

bonusActions.name: Negative Energy Cone
bonusActions.description: The death tyrant's central eye emits an imperceptible, magical wave of negative energy in a 150-foot Cone. Creatures in that area can't regain Hit Points until the start of the death tyrant's next turn. An intact Humanoid corpse there instantly rises as a Zombie under the death tyrant's control and takes its turn immediately after the death tyrant on the same initiative count.

legendaryActions.name: Chomp
legendaryActions.description: The death tyrant makes two Bite attacks.

legendaryActions.name: Glare
legendaryActions.description: The death tyrant uses Eye Rays.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the demilich is destroyed, it reforms and regains all its Hit Points in 1d10 days unless a Wish spell is cast on its remains.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The demilich makes three Necrotic Burst attacks.

actions.name: Necrotic Burst
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +11, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 24 (7d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Howl (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the demilich. Failure: 70 (20d6) Psychic damage. Failure or Success: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of the demilich's next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Energy Drain
legendaryActions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19, one creature the demilich can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 14 (4d6). Failure or Success: The demilich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Grave-Dust Flight
legendaryActions.description: The demilich flies up to its Fly Speed, shedding grave dust. Each creature within 5 feet of the demilich as it moves is targeted once by the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19. Failure: The target has the Blinded condition until the end of the demilich's next turn. Failure or Success: The demilich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Necrosis
legendaryActions.description: The demilich makes one Necrotic Burst attack.

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.description: If the deva dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The deva has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The deva makes two Holy Mace attacks.

actions.name: Holy Mace
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The deva casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only); 1/Day Each: Commune, Raise Dead

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid (2/Day)
bonusActions.description: The deva casts Cure Wounds, Lesser Restoration, or Remove Curse, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.description: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Displacement
traits.description: Attack rolls against the displacer beast have Disadvantage, since it projects an illusion that makes it appear to be near its actual location. This trait is suppressed while the displacer beast has the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The displacer beast makes one Rend attack and one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage. If target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Elemental Restoration
traits.description: If the djinni dies outside the Elemental Plane of Air, its body dissolves into mist, and it gains a new body in 1d4 days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Air.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The djinni has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Wishes
traits.description: The djinni has a 30 percent chance of knowing the Wish spell. If the djinni knows it, the djinni can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the djinni can understand. Once the djinni has cast it three times, the djinni can't do so again for 365 days.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The djinni makes three attacks, using Storm Blade or Storm Bolt in any combination.

actions.name: Storm Blade
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Storm Bolt
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 120 ft. Hit: 13 (3d8) Thunder damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Create Whirlwind
actions.description: The djinni conjures a whirlwind at a point it can see within 120 feet. Strength Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the Restrained condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes 21 (6d6) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The djinni casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Detect Magic; 2/Day Each: Create Food and Water (can create wine instead of water), Tongues, Wind Walk; 1/Day Each: Creation, Gaseous Form, Invisibility, Major Image, Plane Shift
